list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Update Dockerfile and remove PowerShell script
Updated Dockerfile to use a multi-stage build and added a health check. This enhances the efficiency of the build process and ensures proper operation of the container. Also removed the test.ps1 PowerShell script.

task.summary:
Add container deployment and removal scripts
The commit introduces two new scripts, `deploy-container.sh` and `remove-container.sh`, for container management. `deploy-container.sh` script builds and runs a new docker container. `remove-container.sh` script checks for, stops, and removes an existing docker container and its image if they exist. This aids in smoother application deployment and version upgrades. Minor workspace setting changes have also been committed.

Implement subprocess termination after timeout
Added a new feature to the subprocess in `status_observe.py` to automatically terminate it after a preset timeout of 10 minutes. Also, updated the status callback and made minor adjustments in error handling and process restarting. Several changes were applied in `.idea/workspace.xml` to reflect on project level changes.

Update Dockerfile and remove PowerShell script
Updated Dockerfile to use a multi-stage build and added a health check. This enhances the efficiency of the build process and ensures proper operation of the container. Also removed the test.ps1 PowerShell script.

MESSAGE.value:
Add container deployment and removal scripts
The commit introduces two new scripts, `deploy-container.sh` and `remove-container.sh`, for container management. `deploy-container.sh` script builds and runs a new docker container. `remove-container.sh` script checks for, stops, and removes an existing docker container and its image if they exist. This aids in smoother application deployment and version upgrades. Minor workspace setting changes have also been committed.

Implement subprocess termination after timeout
Added a new feature to the subprocess in `status_observe.py` to automatically terminate it after a preset timeout of 10 minutes. Also, updated the status callback and made minor adjustments in error handling and process restarting. Several changes were applied in `.idea/workspace.xml` to reflect on project level changes.

Update Dockerfile and remove PowerShell script
Updated Dockerfile to use a multi-stage build and added a health check. This enhances the efficiency of the build process and ensures proper operation of the container. Also removed the test.ps1 PowerShell script.
